# List All In-App Purchases for an App

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get a list of the in-app purchases for a specific app.

## Getting in-app purchase information

- **List in-app purchases IDs for an app**: Get a list of all in-app purchases IDs for a specific app.
- **List All In-App Purchases for an App V1**: List the in-app purchases that are available for your app.
- **List in-app purchases IDs for an app V1**: Get a list of all in-app purchases IDs for a specific app V1.
